Class NavigationService

java.lang.Object
UI.nav.NavigationService
public final class NavigationService extends Object
Service for navigating between different UI screens.

  • Constructor Details

    • NavigationService

      public NavigationService(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Creates a NavigationService for the given stage.
      Parameters:
      stage - the primary Stage for the application

  • Method Details

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu()
      Shows the main menu screen.

    • showGame

      public void showGame(int size, double hexSize)
      Shows a new game screen for human vs human play.
      Parameters:
      size - the board size
      hexSize - the hex cell size

    • showGame

      public void showGame(int size, double hexSize, Integer aiIterations)
      Shows a new game screen for human vs MCTS AI play.
      Parameters:
      size - the board size
      hexSize - the hex cell size
      aiIterations - the number of MCTS iterations for the AI, or null for default

    • showGameWithAI

      public void showGameWithAI(String agentType, int iterations)
      Shows a new game screen for human vs selected AI play.
      Parameters:
      agentType - the type of AI agent to play against
      iterations - the number of MCTS iterations for the AI (if applicable)

    • showAITesting

      public void showAITesting()
      Shows the AI testing dialog to select two AIs to compete against each other.

    • showAgentSelection

      public void showAgentSelection()
      Shows the agent selection dialog to choose an AI agent to play against.

    • showGameScreen

      private void showGameScreen(int size, double hexSize, ScoreBoard scoreBoard, Consumer<GameController> configure)
      Shows the game screen with the specified configuration.
      Parameters:
      size - the board size
      hexSize - the hex cell size
      scoreBoard - the ScoreBoard to track wins
      configure - a consumer to configure the GameController

    • showSkins

      public void showSkins()
      Shows the skins/case opening view.

    • info

      public void info(String title, String header, String content)
      Opens the game rules PDF in the default system viewer.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the info dialog
      header - the header text of the info dialog
      content - the content text of the info dialog

    • buildAlphaZeroConfig

      private AlphaZeroConfig buildAlphaZeroConfig()
      Builds the AlphaZero configuration with default UI settings.
      Returns:
      the AlphaZeroConfig instance
